title: 2026 Winter Olympics Opening Ceremonies Performers: Mariah Carey, Andrea Bocelli and More
summary_full: The performers include an Italian tenor who is one of the most successful singers in the world and an actress who has had roles in “The White Lotus” and “The Paper.”
